SoloPlayDeath_ToFadeOutTime.Wiki: How many seconds after 'YOU DIED' is displayed when dying in solo play, does it start to fade out?

PartyGhostDeath_ToFadeOutTime.Wiki: How many seconds after 'YOU DIED' is displayed when White or Black Ghost dies, does it begin to fade out?

PlayerMaxHpLimit.Wiki: Used to calculate what percentage of the length of the gauge prepared by resources is used when displaying the AP gauge.

PlayerMaxMpLimit.Wiki: Used to calculate what percentage of the length of the gauge prepared by the resource is used when displaying the MP gauge.

PlayerMaxSpLimit.Wiki: Used to calculate what percentage of the length of the gauge prepared by the resource is used when displaying the Energy gauge.

ActionPanelChangeThreshold_Vel.AltName: Action Panel Change Threshold: Player Velocity
ActionPanelChangeThreshold_Vel.Wiki: Action panel switchable player speed. Switching is possible below this speed.

ActionPanelChangeThreshold_PassTime.AltName: Action Panel Change Threshold: Pass Time
ActionPanelChangeThreshold_PassTime.Wiki: Consideration time for speeding up players who can switch action panels. Use the average speed during this time (maximum 4 seconds according to the system)

PlayerMaxAddHp.Wiki: Value to be added to the player's maximum HP when calculating what percentage of the gauge length prepared by resources is used.

PlayerMaxAddMp.Wiki: Value added to the player's maximum MP when calculating what percentage of the gauge length prepared by resources is used.

PlayerMaxAddSp.Wiki: Value to be added to the player's maximum Energy when calculating what percentage of the gauge length prepared by resources is used.

DecalPosOffsetX.Wiki: Decal display position offset left/right direction

TargetStateSearchDurationTime.Wiki: The number of seconds from when the Search icon of the FE that is likely to be found starts to fade in until it starts to fade out.

TargetStateBattleDurationTime.Wiki: Number of seconds between when the likely FE Battle icon starts fading in and before it starts fading out.

VolatilizeFadeBeginSec.Wiki: FE: Instantaneous impact gauge fade time (in seconds)

MakerRendRangeWidth.Wiki: Definition of which range to draw within 1920

MakerRendRangeHeight.Wiki: Definition of the range within 1080 to draw

HpBarFadeOutTime.Wiki: How many seconds after displaying the AP bar should it start to fade out?

ZeroHpBarFadeOutTime.AltName: AP Bar Fade Out Time on Death
ZeroHpBarFadeOutTime.Wiki: After how many seconds pass after the AP reaches 0, the AP bar starts to fade out?

HitFEViewTime.Wiki: Time to continue displaying hit marker (in seconds)

HackingGaugeFadeOutTime.Wiki: How many seconds should pass before the hacking bar starts to fade out after being unable to be hacked?

VolatilizeCombineSec.Wiki: FE: Instantaneous impact gauge connection time (in seconds)

EnemyLooksLikeSABreakThreshold.Wiki: Threshold (ratio) of Stagger value that produces FE that is likely to cause Stagger break

CamLockInterpolationFactor.Wiki: Coefficient used to supplement lock site movement when camera is fixed. How many times faster is the completion that takes 1 second to move?

CamUnlockInterpolationFactor.Wiki: Coefficient used to supplement lock site movement when camera fixation is released. How many times faster is the completion that takes 1 second to move?

EnemySearchIconFadeOutTime.Wiki: Time to fade out the FE after the display conditions for the enemy search FE above the enemy are no longer met (in seconds)
